page.content:
SOME EVENING{ADULT EDUCATION}CLASSES ARE PROVIDED BY THE LOCAL AUTHORITY.
DUE TO A FALL IN THE NUMBERS OF SECONDARY AGED PUPILS,THE LINCOLNSHIRE COUNTY COUNCIL IS LOOKING INTO THE {REORGANISATION OF SECONDARY EDUCATION IN THIS AREA. THIS WILL LEAD EITHER TO RETAINING THE{SELECTIVE}SYSTEM OR CHANGING TO{COMPREHENSIVE}SCHOOLING. MANY PARENTS ARE CONCERNED ABOUT THE INEQUALITY OF THE PRESENT SYSTEM AND ARE CAMPAIGNING FOR COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLS,WHILE OTHERS FEEL THIS WOULD LEAD TO A FALL IN ACADEMIC STANDARDS AND FAVOUR RETAINING SELECTION.
PARENTS AND FRIENDS OF THE PRIMARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS HELP TO{RAISE FUNDS FOR EXTRA SCHOOL EQUIPMENT E.G.:- COMPUTERS,VIDEO CAMERA,FREEZER,DISPLAY BOARDS,SPORTS ITEMS.
